summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeJoico Heat Hero Glossing Thermal Protector instantly delivers a shield between your hair and any thermal-styling tool in your repertoire; and infuses + fortifies hair with a healthy, glossy sheen that locks out dulling pollutants.
details: DetailsBenefitsThermal protection up to 450 F (232 C)Heat-activated, split-end menderBoosts ShineProtects against pollution*Paraben-free*Laboratory tested using pollution particlesItem 2579854How To UseSpray on dry hair before using a hot tool. Reapply after styling to finish and add hold.IngredientsAlcohol Denat., Hydrofluorocarbon 152a, Cyclopentasiloxane, Isobutane, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Octylacrylamide/Acrylates/Butylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Aminomethyl Propanol, VA/Crotonates/Vinyl Neodecanoate Copolymer, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, PEG-12 Dimethicone, Tocopherol, Benzoic Acid, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Limonene, Hydroxycitronellal, Fragrance/Parfum.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: Spray on dry hair before using a hot tool. Reapply after styling to finish and add hold.

reviews.headline: My favorite
reviews.comments: I use a hot iron daily & this is a must have for me. I  have very fine hair and have found other heat protectors make my hair look greasy. I wash my hair every few days and never have to worry about build up.

reviews.headline: A Must Buy
reviews.comments: Absolutely love this product! My hair stylist got me hooked! Nice protectant and holds hair nicely. Best thing is it smells so amazing! I only wish it was available in all Ulta stores!

reviews.headline: Overall really enjoy it
reviews.comments: I just bought this for the first time and it works well, but the smell is a bit strong. Very much smells like an aerosol hair spray but doesnt leave too much of the smell on your hair. Just might give you a small headache if in a small space.

reviews.headline: I will be buying again
reviews.comments: Worked really well, didn't make my hair feel greasy, and had great shine.

reviews.headline: Solid product
reviews.comments: Solid product, definitely only use after your hair is dry but before a hot styling

reviews.headline: Shiny healthy hair!
reviews.comments: I love this spray! I was looking for one to use on dry hair. I used it before and after curling my hair and it left it so soft and shiny. I would recommend brushing it through before though because it can be a little sticky if not brushed through. It also smells amazing which is a nice plus. Overall i am very happy with it!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again!
reviews.comments: It smells good and makes your hair so soft :)

reviews.headline: Did absolutely nothing for my hair
reviews.comments: Smelled exactly like hair spray - very overpowering. Instead of making my hair glossy it made it crunchy?? It leaves a residue on my hair and it gets on my flat iron and burns on it.

reviews.headline: Glad It Was Free
reviews.comments:
I got this in a new client welcome gift when i gog my hair done at a new salon. I was excited at first but after a handful of uses I see why they were giving it away!

I don't know about the heat protection factor but this dries my hair out instantly when I use it. Shing healthy hair before and then I look like I need some oil and deep conditioner after using it. No thanks!

reviews.headline: Still undecided
reviews.comments:
I have used this product a few times prior to and after straightening my hair. I think it works well.  I just am not sure how to use it.  I have really thick hair so I straighten my hair in layers. Do I use it on each layer? Do I just spray and work thru with my hands/brush? 
The scent is fair, just need to be cautious not to use too much afterwards to prevent and oiky/greasy look.

reviews.headline: I love it!
reviews.comments: I dont know why this rated so low. Ive tried every aerosol heat protectant around, and this is my favorite. I cant say how it good it is at protecting the hair but it feels good in your hair and adds a nice gloss. The scent is unoffensive and not too much. It doesnt make hair sticky or stiff.

reviews.headline: Love this stuff
reviews.comments: I'm always looking for something to use before flat ironing. This stuff is great! It's not sticky like others.

reviews.headline: I hate this product
reviews.comments: Bring Ironclad back. This product doesn't do anything for my hair. It doesn't even smell good. You'd be better off not using any thermal protection than using this.

reviews.headline: Spectacular heat protector
reviews.comments: My hair was so soft and felt rich to touch like velvet after using this product.  It's really nice and affordable

reviews.headline: Love!!!
reviews.comments: Has a great scent and is lightweight. I mostly use on dry hair. Makes my hair soft and shiny!

reviews.headline: Love this stuff!
reviews.comments: I mostly use this after drying hair but before curling. It seems to help protect hair, help hold curls, and absorbs grease so I can go longer without washing hair.

reviews.headline: I LOVE this!
reviews.comments: Helps protect from heat. Helps with frizz and flyaways ‚Ä¶ And the shine is perfect! It's light spray so it doesn't make my thin hair oily.

reviews.headline: Works great
reviews.comments: I use this when I'm curling with my flat iron. It works great on my hair that is thick and coarse and is typically on the dry side. My iron never goes above 350 and I have wonderful results. I'm sad for the previous reviewers who haven't had a good experience with this product. My hair ends up still smooth, soft and shiny.

reviews.headline: Crunchy, dry, itchy disappointment
reviews.comments: I was so stoked to try this because it's hard to find an aerosol heat protectant that you put on dry hair. I tried this one, typically joico is a good brand. I used it as suggested, and it leaves my hair dry, sticky, and dull. I really hate it. I don't feel like it protects my hair. It makes it worse.

reviews.headline: No comparison to Ironclad
reviews.comments: I could not find Ironclad, which worked wonderfully and smelled great!  So I decided I would try this product. It was so disappointing. It was heavy and weighed my hair down. And the smell was so nasty - no nice scent that is expected of a Joico product. Joico missed the boat on this product!  Disappointing on every level.

faceoff_positive.comments: I was bummed IronClad was discontinued but wanted to give this a try even though it had lack luster reviews. Off the bat, the scent on this one was much less chemically compared to IronClad, which I was never a fan of in terms of scent.The scent of IronClad was suffocating at best and the scent of this new glossy heat hero is much lighter and doesn't leave your hair smelling scented, which is a plus for me. My hair is pretty dry from the ends from years of balayage, so I really appreciated the glossy hydrating effect of this product. Even though it beautifully glosses the hair, it doesn't make my hair greasy as some reviewers noted. I am in love with this product. I've been using it for two weeks now and I really don't have any complaints. It's worth the money and I find myself using less finishing gloss and hair oil as this heat protectant is like a two for one. Btw my hair is naturally wavy, a bit of frizz, and I have dry ends. I'm also weary of anything that leaves my hair greasy, which this product didn't do.
faceoff_positive.headline: A MUST HAVE

faceoff_negative.comments: After blow-drying my hair, I applied the JOICO Heat Hero Glossing Thermal Protector before using a curling iron. I prefer a heat protectant that is applied to wet hair. It doesn't make sense to put heat on your hair with a blow dryer and then apply a heat protector. That said, I would have been open to using this product on days I let my hair air dry except (1) On the back of the can, it claims to "leave your hair with a glossy finish." I did not notice a glossy finish to my hair when I finished styling it. (2) This is an aerosol, and it is strong. I had to open the bathroom window. So, use it in a well-ventilated space. (3) My hair had been freshly washed but after applying this product, it went from soft to feeling like I had sprayed my hair with hair spray. I might use this product if I didn't have anything else and have allowed my hair to air dry. Maybe if these things were addressed/changed, I could be persuaded to give it another chance.
faceoff_negative.headline: Wouldn't Go Out of My Way to Purchase
